title: Saudi Aramco raises $4 billion: Shakes global markets, Wall Street buzzing
summary_full: Saudi Arabia’s oil giant Saudi Aramco has successfully raised $4 billion through a bond issuance. The move highlights strong investor trust in the company's financial stability. The issuance, part of a global program, was priced in January 2026 and completed in early February 2026. Proceeds will fund capital expenditures and diversification efforts. This strengthens Aramco's financial position and boosts confidence in Saudi Arabia's economy.
